kpa.solvers

Class BacktrackSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • kpa.solvers.AbstractSolver
      • kpa.solvers.BacktrackSolver

  • public class BacktrackSolver
extends AbstractSolver
    A simple recursive backtrack solver for Kakuro Puzzles. It uses puzzle.getMinNumber() and puzzle.getMaxNumber() to obtain the range of `digits' to try in an empty cell.

    One reasoner strategy can be injected via the constructor. If null, it will be ignored; otherwise, it will be invoked before looking for an empty cell and trying all possible `digits'.

    It makes sense for client code to supply a fixpoint strategy.
